actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, as amended, so as to provide certain benefits to law enforcement officers not employed by the United States.

summary.text: Amends the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to direct the Law Enforcement Assistance Administration to furnish each State or local law enforcement officer or firefighter who retires after the enactment of this Act benefits equal to 25 percent of his State and local retirement benefits.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968, as amended, so as to provide certain benefits to law enforcement officers not employed by the United States.
